Re: Car rental reviews 10 years ago Save No, I haven't. Just booked through Expressions Kerala (expressionskerala@gmail.com), will let you know how it turns out. From talking to them, it seems the reviews are going to be a wash anyway. Most of these companies do not have their own cars (/RentalCars-g297633-Kochi_Cochin_Ernakulam_District_Kerala.html) /drivers. They sub-contract it out to independent cars (/RentalCars-g297633-Kochi_Cochin_Ernakulam_District_Kerala.html) /drivers. So you could get very different experiences on different trips from the same company. Report inappropriate content
